name: @ebowwa/googlesheets
description: CLI tool for programmatic Google Sheets access with OAuth authentication
author: Ebowwa Labs <labs@ebowwa.com>

scripts.build: bun build ./src/cli/index.ts --outdir ./dist/cli --target node --banner '/*#!/usr/bin/env node*/' && bun build ./src/cli/oauth-setup.ts --outdir ./dist/cli --target node --banner '/*#!/usr/bin/env node*/' && bun build ./src/cli/create-via-drive.ts --outdir ./dist/cli --target node --banner '/*#!/usr/bin/env node*/'
